actions.deleteConfirm: Are you sure to delete this conversation?

sidebar.storageNote: Conversations are saved to browser's IndexedDB.

delete.confirm: Are you sure to delete this message?

ariaLabels.switchToPrevious: Switch to the previous message version
ariaLabels.switchToNext: Switch to the next message version

chatInput.placeholder: Type your message... (Shift+Enter to add a new line)

previewDialog.audioNotSupported: Your browser does not support the audio element.

errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is 500MB.
errors.multimodalNotSupported: Multimodal is not supported by this server or model.
errors.videoNotSupported: Video files are not supported yet.
errors.audioNotSupported: Only mp3 and wav audio files are supported.
errors.pdfMultimodalNotSupported: Multimodal is not supported, PDF will be converted to text instead of image.
errors.fileIsBinary: File is binary. Please upload a text file.
errors.failedToLoadSvg: Failed to load SVG image. Ensure the SVG data is valid.

notifications.pdfConvertedToText: PDF file converted to text. You can also convert it to image, see in Settings.

baseUrl.label: Base URL
baseUrl.note: Set the Base URL if you are using standalone server.

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.note: Set the API Key if you are using --api-key option for the server.

systemMessage.label: System Message (will be disabled if left empty)
systemMessage.note: The starting message that defines how model should behave. You can get examples from Awesome ChatGPT Prompts

showRawUserMessage.label: Display user messages raw
showRawUserMessage.note: Markdown processing will be disabled for user messages.

showRawAssistantMessage.label: Display model messages raw
showRawAssistantMessage.note: Markdown processing will be disabled for model messages.

pasteLongTextToFileLen.label: Paste: limitation
pasteLongTextToFileLen.note: When pasting a long text, it will be converted into a file. You can control the file length by setting the value of this parameter. Set to 0 to disable.

pdfAsImage.label: Use PDF as image instead of text
pdfAsImage.note: Attach the PDF as an image instead of text. Supported only with multimodal models with vision support.

showTokensPerSecond.label: Show performance metrics
showTokensPerSecond.note: Activate to see the processing speed, times, etc.

showThoughtInProgress.label: Expand thinking section
showThoughtInProgress.note: Expand thinking message when generating messages

excludeThoughtOnReq.label: Exclude thinking messages on submit
excludeThoughtOnReq.note: Exclude thinking messages when sending requests to API (recommended)

temperature.note: Controls the randomness of the generated text by affecting the probability distribution of the output tokens. Higher = more random, lower = more focused.

top_p.note: Limits tokens to those that together have a cumulative probability of at least p.

min_p.note: Limits tokens based on the minimum probability for a token to be considered, relative to the probability of the most likely token.

max_tokens.note: The maximum number of tokens per output.

samplers.note: The order at which samplers are applied, in simplified way. Default is "dkypmxt": dry->top_k->typ_p->top_p->min_p->xtc->temperature

dynatemp_range.note: Addon for the temperature sampler. The added value to the range of dynamic temperature, which adjusts probabilities by entropy of tokens.

dynatemp_exponent.note: Addon for the temperature sampler. Smoothes out the probability redistribution based on the most probable token.

typical_p.note: Sorts and limits tokens based on the difference between log-probability and entropy.

xtc_probability.note: XTC sampler cuts out top tokens; this parameter controls the chance of cutting tokens at all. 0 disables XTC.

xtc_threshold.note: XTC sampler cuts out top tokens; this parameter controls the token probability that is required to cut that token.

repeat_last_n.note: Last n tokens to consider for penalizing repetition

repeat_penalty.note: Controls the repetition of token sequences in the generated text

presence_penalty.note: Limits the tokens based on whether they appear in the output or not.

frequency_penalty.note: Limits the tokens based on how often they appear in the output.

dry_multiplier.note: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets the DRY sampling multiplier.

dry_base.note: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets the DRY sampling base value.

dry_allowed_length.note: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets the allowed length for DRY sampling.

dry_penalty_last_n.note: DRY sampling reduces repetition in generated text even across long contexts. This parameter sets DRY penalty for the last n tokens.

custom.label: Custom JSON config
custom.note: For more info, refer to server documentation

pyIntepreterEnabled.label: Enable Python interpreter
pyIntepreterEnabled.note: This feature uses pyodide, downloaded from CDN. To use this feature, ask the LLM to generate Python code inside a Markdown code block. You will see a "Run" button on the code block, near the "Copy" button.

ttsPitch.label: Pitch
ttsPitch.note: The pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.

ttsRate.label: Rate
ttsRate.note: The speed at which the utterance will be spoken at.

ttsVoice.label: Voice
ttsVoice.note: The voice that will be used to speak the utterance.

ttsVolume.label: Volume
ttsVolume.note: The volume that the utterance will be spoken at.

experimental.note:
Experimental features are not guaranteed to work correctly.

If you encounter any problems, create a Bug report on Github. Please also specify experimental on the report title and include screenshots.

Some features may require packages downloaded from CDN, so they need internet connection.

check.label: Check
check.text: This is a demo of Web Speech Synthesis.

presetManager.newPreset: Save the current settings as a preset

modals.loadPresetConfirm: Load preset "{{presetName}}"? Current settings will be replaced.

dataTheme.label: Theme
dataTheme.note: Choose the color theme of the application.

syntaxTheme.label: Syntax Theme
syntaxTheme.note: Choose the color theme for the code blocks.

footer.storageNote: Settings are saved in browser's localStorage.

newVersion.title: ðŸŽ‰ New version available
newVersion.description: Update for the latest features & fixes.
newVersion.note: Your conversations will be saved, but don't forget to make a backup before update.

welcomePopup.title: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome
welcomePopup.description: It looks like you don't have the models set up yet. Let's go to the Settings to configure your Inference provider.

noModelsPopup.title: ðŸ˜” No Models Found
noModelsPopup.description: It looks like you don't have the models set up yet or there is an issue with your Provider. Let's go to the Settings to check.

errors.failedToGetResponse: Failed to get response from AI.

samplePrompts: Tell me a fun fact for today.
Tell me a joke.
Give me three interesting science facts.
List the planets in our solar system.
Explain the rules of chess.
What are some good conversation starters?
Give 10 gift ideas for best friend.
Write a birthday message for my friend.
Suggest themes for a birthday party.
Give me ideas for a game night.
Give me ideas for a weekend getaway.
Tips for my first solo trip.
Explain a complex concept simply.
Fix the grammar in this text.
Summarize the following text.
Rewrite this to be more formal/casual.
Help me write a professional email.
Create a schedule for my workday.
Summarize these meeting notes.
Give me ideas for a team building activity.
